simplenlg.kb
Class JavaKBClass

java.lang.Object
  simplenlg.kb.JavaKBClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
KBEntity
public abstract class JavaKBClass
extends Object
implements KBEntity

JavaKBClass is a superclass for classes in a JavaKB

All classes in a JavaKB must extend this class. It implements the KBEntity methods.

Constructor Detail

JavaKBClass

public JavaKBClass()
Method Detail

getType

public String getType()
Description copied from interface: KBEntity
returns the type of this KBEntity

This is the name of the class if the entity is a class. If the entity is an instance, this returns the name of the class the instance instantiates.

Specified by:
getType in interface KBEntity

getValue

public Object getValue(String featureName)
Description copied from interface: KBEntity
returns the value of the specified feature.

Value can be Date, Double, Integer, Boolean, String, or KBEntity. Null is returned if there is no value for this feature If the value is a class/entity, it is assumed to be a KBEntity.

Specified by:
getValue in interface KBEntity
